## Source: ossf-package-analysis (19af5203b034f6420f173bf6e45719afeb28ecfe359a8858cbe814fe3cd55d11)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'supplychain-firewall-benchmark-hello' @ 1.10.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
